title: Ticket #6463: Change IS_OWNER default to False
description:
The current default value for IS_OWNER (START =?= False) has repeatedly bitten people with surprising and bad behavior. We should change the default to False, and require people to opt-in to the current behavior.

The following START expression attempts to limit matches to a certain class of jobs. But it results in the machine staying in Owner state forever: 

START = TARGET.Matlab =?= True

The following START expression will crash the startd with an infinite recursion in state changes between Owner and Unclaimed: 

START = State != "Unclaimed" || time() - EnteredCurrentState > 300

The Owner state (and IS_OWNER) is an artifact of Condor's cycle-scavenging roots. Most of our users today run Condor on dedicated resources and don't need the Owner state. By changing the default value of IS_OWNER to False, we avoid the issues above for these users with no detriment. Users working in a cycle-scavenging mode can opt into the old behavior. We should restore the old setting in the Desktop POLICY.
